# ui-tab-panel



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

`ui-tab-panel` is a component for rendering a tab panel within a tab context.
It displays content associated with a specific tab.
The panel is shown when the corresponding tab is active.

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                                  | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `value`  | `value`   | the value of the tab panel, used to identify it within the tab context. This should match the value of the corresponding `ui-tab` component. | `string` | `undefined` |
